message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.CV 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) because it deals with text clustering using neural networks. It could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) as it involves representation learning and optimization. Additionally, it could be categorized under cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as it deals with clustering of short texts. It could also be classified under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as it involves the use of neural networks for clustering. Finally, it could be categorized under cs.CV (Computer Vision) as deep learning techniques are used to represent the short texts as distributed vectors.
